paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: The mutation was described as deleterious and pathogenic in the UMD BRCA share™ and ClinVar database.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was used in CRISPR/Cas9 experiments to induce mutations in cell lines.
key_quotes: Each mutation was described as deleterious and pathogenic in the UMD BRCA share™ and ClinVar database.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was found in the paper.
